DOC.brief_title: Effect Metformin Therapy Serum Under-carboxylated Osteocalcin Levels Hyperandrogenic Lean Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome Women
DOC.detailed_description: Under-carboxylated osteocalcin ( ucOC ) , precursor substrate bone biomarker OC potent regulator energy metabolism promote insulin production adiponectin synthesis decrease fat stores.UcOC potential role physiopathology polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) , common disorder define constellation anovulation , insulinresistance , hyperinsulinemia , obesity androgen excess.Circulating ucOC concentration relate key endocrine PCOS characteristic weight-dependent manner . Within bone-pancreas loop , high ucOC may favor insulin release lean hyperandrogenic woman compensate impaired insulin sensitivity.We investigate serum uc-OC response insulin sensitize therapy lean hyperandrogenic polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) .
